backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all backend types (Product, Order, UserProfile, SubscriptionTier, etc.), in-memory state maps, and shared functions for store settings, products, categories, orders, user profiles, admin management, and subscription tiers with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a single feature (rewriting the AdminAccessControl form submission handler with Enter-key support, loading state, error handling, and retry logic) to its affected file, components, and test ID REQ-95.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the frontend codebase's pages, components, and their key behaviours.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH design tokens for light and dark themes (backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, chart colours, sidebar) plus base body and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the React app with the `dark` class pre-applied and inline critical CSS setting a dark background to prevent a white flash before hydration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up QueryClient, ThemeProvider, hash-based routing, cart state, Internet Identity auth, and renders the correct page component (Storefront, ProductDetail, Checkout, Admin, Subscriptions, etc.) based on the current route.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Standalone screen component displaying an access-denied message with a ShieldX icon and a 'Back to Store' link, styled with sunset/red OKLCH colours.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminWhite: React component for managing an admin username whitelist, allowing admins to add or remove usernames with confirmation dialogs and toast notifications, backed by React Query cache.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Admin component that fetches and displays all orders in a table, showing buyer info, product name, payment method, and order status using React Query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentsMa: Admin component for reviewing and acting on orders, displaying payment method and approval status badges with approve/decline actions that call backend mutations via React Query.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Form component for creating or editing a product, handling fields like game name, title, description, price, and availability, and submitting via add/update product mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Admin component that lists all products in a table with options to add, edit, or delete products using dialogs and alert dialogs, backed by React Query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/StoreSetti: Admin component for managing store payment wallet addresses (PayPal, Bitcoin, Ethereum), pre-populating fields from fetched settings and saving each independently with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/Subscripti: Admin UI component for managing subscription tiers, allowing editing of monthly/yearly prices and toggling free trial availability per tier.
frontend/src/components/AdminAccessContr: Form-based admin gate component that submits a username to the backend `isAdminUsername` call via a `<form onSubmit>` handler, manages idle/checking/granted/denied/error states with a loading spinner, inline error display, and a retry reset option, all styled with the sunset gold/orange theme.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: A slide-in cart drawer component that displays cart items with remove functionality, calculates the total price, and provides a checkout button.
frontend/src/components/CategoryCard.tsx: A button component that renders a selectable product category pill with active/inactive styling.
frontend/src/components/checkout/CryptoP: Checkout component for cryptocurrency payments (BTC/ETH) that displays wallet addresses with a generated QR code, copy functionality, and a confirm button.
frontend/src/components/checkout/GiftCar: Checkout component for UK gift card payments that validates a gift card code, collects card number and balance, then confirms the order.
frontend/src/components/checkout/PayIn3P: Checkout component that splits a payment into 3 monthly installments, showing a schedule of due dates and requiring user agreement before confirming.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Payment: UI component that renders a grid of selectable payment method options (PayPal, Crypto, Gift Card, Pay in 3) and highlights the currently selected one.
frontend/src/components/checkout/PayPalP: Checkout component for PayPal payments that simulates a redirect to PayPal and then allows the user to confirm the order after authorization.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A site footer displaying the Game Vault brand, store navigation links, accepted payment methods, and a caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: A stub/no-op layout component kept for compatibility; actual layout is handled in App.tsx.
A full-screen loading screen with a 40-second video background and a clip-path progress animation on the 'GAME VAULT' title, revealing an enter button when complete.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: A sticky top navigation bar with links to Store, Subscriptions, and Admin pages, a cart icon with item count badge, and Internet Identity login/logout support.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: A card component displaying a product's game name, title, description, price, and category badge, with add-to-cart and view-details actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal that prompts newly authenticated users to choose a unique username, with debounced availability checking and validation before submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using the user's Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Defines a React context and provider for shopping cart state, exposing addItem, removeItem, clearCart, totalItems, and totalPrice. Also exports the useCart hook for consuming the cart context.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook that manage Internet Computer authentication via AuthClient, exposing identity, login/clear functions, and login status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profiles, usernames, categories, products, orders, and subscriptions using the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Orbitron and Rajdhani fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, and defines a sunset/dusk-themed design system with CSS custom properties, glow effects, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/models/Vehicle.tsx: Defines Three.js 3D vehicle models (SportsCar, Motorcycle, RealisticCar) as React components using @react-three/fiber, with a Vehicle wrapper that animates them along a lane using useFrame.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin panel page with tabbed navigation for managing products, orders, payments, admin whitelist, subscriptions, and store settings, wrapped in an AdminAccessControl guard component.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Multi-step checkout page (review, contact, payment method, payment details) that collects user info and places an order via the usePlaceOrder hook, supporting PayPal, crypto, gift card, and Pay-in-3 payment methods.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details after purchase, polling every 30 seconds for live approval status updates and showing approved/declined/pending badges alongside product and payment info.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows a single product's full details (description, price, availability, category) with an Add to Cart button and a back navigation link.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Main storefront listing page with a hero section, search bar, and a filtered product grid fetched via React Query hooks for available products and categories.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionCheckoutP: Multi-step subscription checkout page supporting PayPal and cryptocurrency payment methods, displaying tier details, billing cycle, free trial info, and mock crypto addresses.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionsPage.tsx: React page displaying subscription tier cards (Starter, Basic, Premium, Pro) with monthly/yearly billing toggle, pricing, perks, and a subscribe button; fetches tier data via useSubscriptionTiers hook and delegates purchase to an onSubscribe callback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to extract URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routes, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean sensitive params from the URL bar without page reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with a sunset color palette (gold, orange, pink, purple, dusk tones), custom fonts (Orbitron, Rajdhani), neon/sunset box shadows, and keyframe animations like pulse-glow, float, and shimmer.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot (version 53) describing the Game Vault ICP e-commerce app's architecture, features (loading screen, subscriptions, admin panel, auth), known issues, and design decisions including the sunset aesthetic and admin username whitelist.
